attributes.action: Allow Ukrainians fleeing their war struck country to enter the UK without a visa
attributes.background: The UK Government needs to allow Ukrainians fleeing the Russian Attack to enter the UK without a visa and without the need to apply for asylum. The EU has already allowed this for the next 3 years and it would be a good way to further our support for Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
